title: Looking for merchandise
body:
I knw im cutting it a bit late with postage and being so close t christmas but my brother is a huge player and is the one who got me started so wanted to buy him some League related merchandise for christmas. I don't want to just do a default buy and get him a gift card.

What sites can I go to that will ship to or in New Zealand?

Prefer not to get him clothing

replies.body:
Theres not much in there. Only thing from there that he would probably like is the thresh statue.

I'd like a site with accessories like lanyards and band bracelet things. A decent range to choose from

The only option I know are RP cards for him to Top up with. I know it might be a very daft choice but it means he can get what he wants in game. You can buy them at local supermarkets like Countdown, Woolworth etc.
Honestly, I might have to go with this. I didn't want to but I can't find a site with more options
